alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 10:14PM CDT until August 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in west central Arkansas... Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Northern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Southeastern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1013 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Brentwood to 6 miles southeast of Winslow to 2 miles west of Chester to 3 miles northwest of Lee Creek, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Ozark... Charleston... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Alma... Barling... West Fork... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Altus... Winslow... Branch... Denning... Chester... Rudy... Wiederkehr Village... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 2 and 42. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 9. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
